description: I. NHS resource allocation: a study of costs of provising health services in rural areas. 117 p. II. Report of the Advisory Committee on Resource Allocation. 56 p. III. Combining Age Related and Additional Needs (CARAN) Report. 2007 review of the needs formulae for hospital services and prescribing activity in England. 229 p. IV. Review of Specific Cost Approach to Staff Market Forces Factor. 304 p.
